name: Plaza San Martín
address: Av. San Martín y Chile, San Rafael, Mendoza
description: A historic plaza with green areas, monuments, and local events.

name: Bodega La Abeja
address: Av. Hipólito Yrigoyen 1535, San Rafael, Mendoza
description: One of the oldest wineries in the region, offering guided tours and tastings.

name: Cañón del Atuel
description: A stunning canyon known for rafting, trekking, and scenic views along the river.

name: Parque Hipólito Yrigoyen
address: Av. Hipólito Yrigoyen y Rawson, San Rafael, Mendoza
description: Spacious urban park with cultural spaces, playgrounds, and recreational areas.

name: Museo Ferroviario
description: A museum dedicated to the region’s railway history with restored locomotives and exhibitions.

name: Los Reyunos
address: Embalse Los Reyunos, San Rafael, Mendoza
description: A dam and reservoir ideal for kayaking, fishing, and enjoying mountain landscapes.

name: Catedral San Rafael Arcángel
description: Beautiful neo-gothic style cathedral located in the heart of the city.

name: Mercado Municipal
description: A vibrant market offering fresh produce, local crafts, and traditional foods.
